page.title: 17A day in the life (teenager)
page.content: I usually get up about{6.30am}and go downstairs and get some{breakfast.}I leave the house at{6.45am}and go and do a{paper round.}I deliver to about 30 houses in all. I get back about 7.30am and get ready for school.The {bus}arrives at the bottom of my road at{8.15am }and takes us straight to {Shelley High School}which is about 2 miles from where I live.The school is quite a large one. It consists of 3 years and a 6th form.We have lessons all morning with a short break and {lunchtime}begins at{11.40am.}We stop for a school meal and usually play netball.Afternoon school is from 1pm to 3.25pm when I catch the bus home.I have{tea}at{4.30pm}with my family and then do my homework which takes about 2 hours.Afterwards I go to my friend's house where we play records.I have to be home by{9.30pm. } {Lisa, aged 14.
